Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​HomeViewModel
ViewModelBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​HomeViewModel

HomeViewModel class stores the logic & data of the HomeView.  The main goal of the HomeViewModel is to handle user operations on the main program view.  This class inherits from Galasoft.MvvmLight.ViewModelBase which is the base class for any ViewModel in MVVM pattern.

m_dataState
private readonly DataState m_dataState

Initializes a new instance of the HomeViewModel class.
